meanings.definition: The act of suspending something again.
meanings.sent1: The resuspensions of the chandelier made it sparkle even more.
meanings.sent2: After the earthquake, the resuspensions of the dust in the air created a hazy atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The resuspensions of the party decorations added a festive touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her resuspensions of disbelief were shattered when she saw the magician's trick.
meanings.sent5: The resuspensions of the snowflakes in the wind looked like a swirling dance.
